reuters.title: SOUTHMARK <SM> TO PURCHASE <NATIONAL SELF>
reuters.body: National Self Storage said has sold nine storage facilities to Southmark Corp for 37.1 mln dlrs. National Self, a developer of storage space for business records, said the purchase includes nine storage facilties. National Self also said it and Southmark plan a two-year 100 facility expansion program in South Florida and across the country. Reuter 
